title: T206 Old Mill Addie Joss wet sheet transfer
author: drumback

posts.post_title: T206 Old Mill Addie Joss wet sheet transfer
posts.post_content:
T206 Old Mill Joss wet sheet transfer.  The transfer shows better in person than in this scan.  Once you get past the paper loss in the lower right, this is a very nice card.  $125 delivered.

Mark
[url]drumback2@cox.net[/url]
